name: Charmmmmyyyyy
greetingText: Your name’s iconic, coz obviously I’m the genius behind it!
wishText: May the force of coding bugs never haunt you, and your console stay forever clear! ;)
text1: FINALLY!! It's time for the world to celebrate! Happy Birthday, my Panda Queen!! The big 21, Aunty mode activated :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to moi Panda!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: I Love You So Much Charloo
outroText: Okay, now come back and call me, Say I love you too.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
